entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Acadie 5:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -7.0°C
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm across upper Richelieu. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
